availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Thomas G. Slater, Sr. (Louisville, Kentucky, night policeman)

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, policeman. Kentucky native. Married to Catherine Slater. Father of Thomas G. Slater, Jr., Emma L. Slater, Blanche Slater, and James H. Slater. Policeman in Louisville in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson, Louisville Ward 8, p. 777.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville Ward 11, p. 417A.
"Thomas Graves Slater Sr. (1833-1881)," Find A Grave, Memorial 207049003, accessed May 11, 2023, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/207049003.
KYR-0001-006-0106.
